attributes.action: Make the remain campaign pay back the tax payers money it wasted on the leaflets
attributes.background: Make the money wasters pay it back. It should never have been allowed for them to use tax payers money.

rejection.details: The leaflet was distributed by the UK Government, not by the official Remain campaign. The cost of compensating tax payers as the petition suggests would be therefore borne by the taxpayer, so it is not clear how taxpayers could be reimbursed in this way.
